Text.valUnicode: Enable Debug mode and put break points in each event handler, step through examples and observe behavior in Activity monitor and Variable viewer

ExpSyntax.val: FlwMtr('Outside any Block While: LoopCounter() = ' & Str(LoopCounter(), '1'), 'FALSE'LOG)
FlwMtr('Outer loop scope, before Inner loop: LoopCounter() = ' & Str(LoopCounter(), '1'), 'FALSE'LOG)
FlwMtr('Outer loop scope, after Inner loop: LoopCounter() = ' & Str(LoopCounter(), '1'), 'FALSE'LOG)
